about_the_game:
Yuuka Kazami wanders into the dreams of Gensokyo residents past, present, and future and causes trouble.

A fanwork of Touhou Project, and remake/expansion of/sequel to the 2020 Touhou Pride Game Jam 2 game Dream of a Sunflower.

- 3D Bullet Hell Combat

Face off against the relentless but beautiful danmaku barrages of Touhou characters, translated to 3D. Pummel their sources with parasol and familiars, redirect bullets with well-timed parries, or fire off a few spellcards of your own to capture victory.

- Gardening-Based Character Growth System

Plant flowers anywhere and water them to strengthen Yuuka's attributes. As each season of a Dream passes, they may die; but perhaps this way, they can be raised again stronger...

- Delve Into Dreams

Each world Yuuka explores arises from the slumber of a fellow Gensokyo inhabitant. As the barrier outside decays, these increasingly turn to memory and fantasy.

"All flowers wilt and die; it's up to the gardener to make sure they bloom first, don't you think?"

legal_notice:
Touhou Project is owned by Team Shanghai Alice. This is a derivative work conforming to the Guidelines for Touhou Project Fan Creators.

There may be differences from the original games, including but not limited to: character depictions, tanks, and buses existing in Gensokyo.
